医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明加糖饮料与较高的心房颤动风险之间存在联系根据今天发表的新研究，每周饮用两升（约 67 盎司）或更多含糖或人工甜味饮料的成年人，与饮用较少此类饮料的成年人相比，患心律不齐（称为心房颤动）的风险更高循环：心律失常和电生理学，美国心脏协会的同行评审期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Study-shows-link- Between-sweetened-drinks-and-higher-atrial-fibrillation-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Study-shows-link- Between-sweetened-drinks-and-higher-atrial-fibrillation-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7062465b-3f4e-46de-87c8-173a805ac386 Tue, 05 Mar 2024 23:00:00 -0500 Study shows link between sweetened drinks and higher atrial fibrillation risk
复杂的妊娠与日后患心血管疾病的风险增加两倍有关卑尔根大学的研究人员调查了 40 岁女性的怀孕史与后来死于心血管疾病的风险之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Complicated-pregnancies-linked-to-twoe28090fold-increased-risk-of-later-cardioangio-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Complicated-pregnancies-linked-to-twoe28090fold-increased-risk-of-later-cardioangio-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=17c8a557-76eb-4454-8b8f-7022826b099f Tue, 05 Mar 2024 22:27:00 -0500 Complicated pregnancies linked to two‐fold increased risk of later cardiovascular disease
研究显示，澳大利亚 Z 世代对气候变化非常担忧科廷大学的新研究表明，澳大利亚年轻人对气候变化非常担忧，气候变化对他们的生活产生了重大影响，并可能在未来几十年产生更广泛的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Australian-Gen-Z-people-have-major-concerns-about-climate-change-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Australian-Gen-Z-people-have-major-concerns-about-climate-change-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf57b89c-219f-491f-9dee-975a5e7ca1ed Tue, 05 Mar 2024 22:22:22 -0500 Australian Gen Z people have major concerns about climate change, research shows
研究旨在评估临床环境中外周动脉容量测量的再现性宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。内皮功能的评估对于了解心血管疾病的进展至关重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Study-aims-to-evaluate-peripheral-arterial-volume-measurement-reproducibility-in-clinical-setting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Study-aims-to-evaluate-peripheral-arterial-volume-measurement-reproducibility-in-clinical-setting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=94177195-867f-4d89-8b49-d4a2f14a77e7 Tue, 05 Mar 2024 22:13:00 -0500 Study aims to evaluate peripheral arterial volume measurement reproducibility in clinical setting
科学家开发出强大的 iPSC 衍生的再生 T 淋巴细胞用于宫颈癌治疗宫颈癌是影响全世界女性的最常见恶性肿瘤之一。仅 2020 年，就有约 600,000 名女性被诊断出患有这种疾病，超过 314,000 人因此死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Scientists-develop-robust-iPSC-衍生-rejuvenated-T-淋巴细胞-for-cervical-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Scientists-develop-robust-iPSC-衍生-rejuvenated-T-淋巴细胞-for-cervical-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=467abf73-40b9-42a9-aef3-1e938f131f10 Tue, 05 Mar 2024 22:03:48 -0500 Scientists develop robust iPSC-derived rejuvenated T lymphocytes for cervical cancer treatment
肝淋巴上皮瘤样癌与 HCC 患者 CEUS 影像特征的比较宣布在《BIO Integration》杂志上发表一篇新文章。原发性肝淋巴上皮瘤样癌（LELC）是一种发病率较低的恶性肿瘤，但近年来病例报告数量有所增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Comparing-CEUS-imaging-features-in-患者-with-hepatic-lymphoepithelioma-like-carcinoma-and-HCC.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Comparing-CEUS-imaging-features-in-患者-with-hepatic-lymphoepithelioma-like-carcinoma-and-HCC.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c70958c-b505-4138-bb30-1ce0dda8c42f Tue, 05 Mar 2024 21:42:37 -0500 Comparing CEUS imaging features in patients with hepatic lymphoepithelioma-like carcinoma and HCC
解读 GPCR 在肥胖病理学中的作用以用于药物开发宣布在《药物学报》杂志上发表新文章。 G 蛋白偶联受体 (GPCR) 是治疗肥胖等代谢性疾病的重要潜在药物靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Deciphering-the-role-of-GPCRs-in-obesity-pathology-for-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Deciphering-the-role-of-GPCRs-in-obesity-pathology-for-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a77dcd2-ae73-4bd1-80dc-51c09625e6c3 Tue, 05 Mar 2024 20:25:25 -0500 Deciphering the role of GPCRs in obesity pathology for drug development
4D XStrain STE：用于估计局部和整体心肌功能的可靠、经济的工具宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。由于二维斑点追踪超声心动图 (STE) 具有出色的非侵入性评估左心室 (LV) 收缩功能的能力，因此越来越多地在全球超声心动图实验室中使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/4D-XStrain-STE-A-reliable-economical-tool-for-estimating-regional-and-global-myocardial-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/4D-XStrain-STE-A-reliable-economical-tool-for-estimating-regional-and-global-myocardial-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5da89098-722f-42b5-9ebf-bfa60c379c6e Tue, 05 Mar 2024 20:19:00 -0500
华盛顿州立大学的研究人员发现了治疗困难细菌感染的潜在“特洛伊木马”一项新的研究表明，细菌可以被诱骗发送死亡信号，以阻止其粘稠的保护性家园的生长，从而导致致命的感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/WSU-researchers-find-pottial-e28098trojan-horsee28099-for-treating-difficult-bacterial-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/WSU-researchers-find-pottial-e28098trojan-horsee28099-for-treating-difficult-bacterial-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b7a9c7d9-3ab7-4dbb-a70a-158d37f11984 Tue, 05 Mar 2024 20:11:46 -0500 WSU researchers find potential ‘trojan horse’ for treating difficult bacterial infections
研究发现，产前接触尼古丁可能会增加新生儿行为障碍的风险尽管一些研究将怀孕期间吸烟与神经发育障碍联系起来，但对产前接触尼古丁的小鼠进行的行为实验结果却不一致。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Prenatal-exposure-to-nicotine-could-increase-risk-of-behavioral-disorders-in-newborns-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240305/Prenatal-exposure-to-nicotine-could-increase-risk-of-behavioral-disorders-in-newborns-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98068370-8059-4890-b6da-e7ac3e3cb09e Tue, 05 Mar 2024 20:05:01 -0500 Prenatal exposure to nicotine could increase risk of behavioral disorders in newborns, study finds
